channel.title: Projects on Ian Michael Trotter
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ian Michael Trotter

item.title: Developing the Norwegian Energy System in the European Energy Transition (NORENS)
item.description: What will be the role of the Norwegian electric sector in the ongoing transition of the European energy system?

item.title: Reverse the Curse: Can Quantum Computing Lift Bellmanâ€™s Curse of Dimensionality?
item.description: We study approximation methods and the application of quantum computing to stochastic dynamic optimisation problems.

item.title: Accelerating Numerical Stochastic Dynamic Optimisation for Applied Economics
item.description: We are developing new and faster ways of solve stochastic dynamic optimisation problems numerically.

item.title: PAEG
item.description: A Computable General Equlibrium (CGE) model for Brazil, based on GTAP, with separate modelling of the five Brazilian macro-regions.
